Poly Archives at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology
Ready Reference Collection
Polytechnic Institute of Brooklyn
Polytechnic Institute of New York
Polytechnic University (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.)
Brooklyn Collegiate and Polytechnic Institute
RG.040
5.25 Cubic Feet (Four drawers of a filing cabinet)
1800s-2019 Materials almost entirely in English. 1 2 3 4
Scope and Contents
The collection covers people, places, and institutions that relate to Polytechnic in a variety of ways. This includes material about staff and alumni, current and former departments or locations, and records of different groups and events at Poly.
Arrangement
The folders in the collection are arranged alphabetically with the relevant portion of the title in asterisks if not the first text.
Individuals not identified by individually titled folders may have related materials in the "People" alphabetical folders.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open for research without restriction.
Conditions Governing Use
Permission to publish materials must be obtained from:
Poly Archives Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology 5 MetroTech Center, Brooklyn, NY 11201
Phone: (646) 997-3943 E-mail: polyarchives@nyu.edu
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date; RG-040: Ready Reference Collection; drawer number; folder number; Poly Archives & Special Collections at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, New York University Libraries.
Processing Information
Chart of cross-references posted on filing cabinet were created March 2009 by Heather Walters. Folders re-alphabetized and some renamed in 2019 by Zoe Blecher-Cohen. Some folders were also combined or removed.
Duplicates above three in a folder were deaccessioned and irrelevant materials were removed from folders. Items like DVDs and CDs were also separated.
